thread.section_title: LightBulbs.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LightBulbs.com | lightbulbs.com
thread.title: Arthur Todesco

author: Arthur Todesco
title: Arthur Todesco
text: LightBulbs did really well, both for the original shipment and the shipment of replacement product for 3 lamps. It appeared the lamps somehow died because of moisture getting into the lamp. When I reported the failure, they had one in stock, but the other would not arrive until March. They asked if I wanted them to ship the in stock units immediately. I asked they do it all in one and all was great.
